Texts.Chs:
生存于严寒地带，坚韧不拔的杂食生物，热爱科学。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
生命值上限^green;+15^reset;%，移动速度^green;+5^reset;%，击退抵抗^green;+25^reset;%
抗性：寒冷抗性^green;+40^reset;%
免疫：寒冷，并，液氮

^orange;环境^reset;:
寒冷生态：生命值上限^green;+15^reset;%，能量值上限^green;+15^reset;%

^orange;武器^reset;:
枪械：伤害^green;+10^reset;%，暴击伤害^green;+1^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
减益：能量值上限^red;-12^reset;%
抗性：火焰抗性^red;-30^reset;%，辐射抗性^red;-10^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
Resilient, cold-dwelling Omnivore creatures with a love for science.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;,
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Ice, +^green;25^reset;% Knockback
  +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Liquid Nitrogen, Cold, Ice
  +^green;75^reset; Max Food

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  On cold biomes: Health & Energy x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  All Guns: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.88^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire , -^red;10^reset;% Radiation
